org.multiverse.datastructures.refs
Interface ManagedRef<E>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbaRef, Ref, Ref
public interface ManagedRef<E>

An object responsible for storing an ref so that it can be managed by a Transaction. Atm there is no support for primitives, but if needed please send in a request or create one yourself (just replace the generic type by a primitive version).

Author:
Peter Veentjer

Method Summary
 E clear()
          Clears the ref and returns the old value of the ref (could be null).
 E get()
          Gets the current stored ref, or null if no ref is stored.
 E getOrAwait()
          Gets the current stored ref, or retries.
 boolean isNull()
          Checks if the ref is null.
 E set(E ref)
          Sets the current ref.
 

Method Detail

get

E get()
Gets the current stored ref, or null if no ref is stored.

Returns:
the current stored ref, or null if no ref is stored.

getOrAwait

E getOrAwait()
Gets the current stored ref, or retries. So you will always get a non null ref.

Returns:
the current stored reference.

set

E set(E ref)
Sets the current ref. The ref is allowed to be null.

Parameters:
ref - the ref to set.
Returns:
the previous ref, which could be null.

clear

E clear()
Clears the ref and returns the old value of the ref (could be null).

Returns:
the old value.

isNull

boolean isNull()
Checks if the ref is null.

Returns:
true if the ref is null, false otherwise.
